description: The response for the `get` command of Credential Helpers.

headers.description: The headers containing credentials which tools should add to all requests to the URI.

expires.description:
The time when the credentials expire and the tool should re-validate them, formatted as ISO 8601.

If set, tools **SHOULD** not invoke the `get` command of the Credential Helper for the URI before this time has passed or before the remote service indicates the credentials are expired, revoked, or invalid for any other reason. Otherwise, tools **MAY** assume that the credentials are valid indefinitely or for a tool-specified duration before re-validating them.

title: GetCredentialsResponse
